Class DirectBytes

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class DirectBytes
extends ByteBufferBytes
    ByteBuffer based direct bytes.

    • Method Detail

      • allocate

        public static DirectBytes allocate(int size)
        Allocates a new direct byte array.
        Parameters:
        size - The count of the buffer to allocate (in bytes).
        Returns:
        The direct buffer.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If count is greater than the maximum allowed count for an array on the Java heap - Integer.MAX_VALUE - 5
